quote: Every time there was conquest, it brought trade, new ideas, and inventions. They made civilization evolve to new heights. Humans soar on the wings of our violent nature. There's no other way.
quote_letters: EVERY TIME THERE WAS CONQUEST IT BROUGHT TRADE NEW IDEAS AND INVENTIONS THEY MADE CIVILIZATION EVOLVE TO NEW HEIGHTS HUMANS SOAR ON THE WINGS OF OUR VIOLENT NATURE THERES NO OTHER WAY
